properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_IMG TO_CHAR( ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER"" WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SNS_FL = 'N' AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(MEMBER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
